Posts.Content: I'm going though some of the same, I know how you feel.Just return,after waiting four days. they drain three cyst, two of the three were sent out for further eval..I will get those results on tues. i ask alot of questions, however no direct answers, aren't doctors wonderful. In your case, If they told you to return in 6mo, I would take it as they are closely watching you. Trust me if there was something,they would going in and take a sample. I hope that helps
Posts.Title: abnormal mammogram
